report.title: My Sleepy Sedated Day
report.author: C. Alm
report.bodytext: I have been taking psychoactives for a little over 2 1/2 years now. When i saw how little info there was on gabapentin, i decided to share my story just for some extra information. /n /n The first time that i tried it i snorted two of the little capsules with 300 mg each. All i remember is going out into the living room to watch tv, and then waking up the next day on the couch. This intrigued me because i dont even remember feeling tired. /n /n Knowing that insufflation is a quicker method of administration, thus not giving me time to observe 'coming up', i then took two tabs orally the next day. 30 minutes later i snorted a half of one and my friend took the other half in a couple of lines. /n We then smoked a bowl of chronic. /n /n About an hour after we smoked i started noticing some threshold effects. I felt kind of lathargic and it took me a little extra time to react to external stimuli. Not euphoric, but not unpleasant. /n /n Feeling the initial effects and wanting to explore into this chemical a little bit more i then decided to snort one more pill. An oh boy am i glad i did! /n /n The sedation intensified and i entered a world similar to valium but with more coke-like thought processes. Kind of hard to explain. The body high was similar to alcohol and barbs but not exactly. /n /n The real interesting thing about this drug is the classification for recreational use. The crazy thing was that i got some mild visual hallucinations at a fairly low dosage. /n /n There was a girl sitting in front of me in class. It looked like smoke was rising out of her hair, very strange. If you have ever tripped diphenhydramine/ dimenhydrinate the visuals are pretty spot on like that. But without the shitty cottonmouth. /n /n All in all Gabapentin takes a long time to come up and when I'm high, I just want to go to sleep. But some good feelings and mild visuals were attained.
